nodes.title: Database Migration to PostgreSQL
nodes.body:
Migrate legacy MySQL database to PostgreSQL 14.

This is a critical infrastructure upgrade that will improve performance and enable advanced features.

## Goals
- Zero downtime migration
- Data integrity validation
- Performance benchmarking

nodes.title: Schema Migration
nodes.body: Convert MySQL schema to PostgreSQL format

nodes.title: Data Migration Pipeline
nodes.body: Build and test data migration pipeline

nodes.title: Validation Framework
nodes.body: Create automated validation and comparison tools

nodes.title: Analyze existing MySQL schema
nodes.body: Document all tables, indexes, constraints, and relationships

nodes.title: Convert schema to PostgreSQL
nodes.body: Handle data type differences, stored procedures, and triggers

nodes.title: Build data export pipeline
nodes.body: Create efficient data extraction from MySQL

nodes.title: Implement data transformations
nodes.body: Handle encoding, null values, and data type conversions

nodes.title: Build PostgreSQL import process
nodes.body: Optimize bulk import with COPY and parallel loading

nodes.title: Implement checksum validation
nodes.body: Compare row counts and data checksums between databases

nodes.title: Build query comparison tool
nodes.body: Run identical queries on both databases and compare results
